```{python}
import toy_problem as TP
import holoviews as hv
import geoviews as gv
import geoviews.feature as gf
```

```{python}
hv.extension('bokeh')
```

```{python}
da_of, ocean_flux, ocean_flux_KG, anthro_conc, ocean_conc, plant_conc = TP.main()
```

```{python}
OFKG = gv.Dataset(ocean_flux_KG).to(gv.QuadMesh, kdims=['lon', 'lat']) * gf.coastline
OF = gv.Dataset(da_of).to(gv.QuadMesh, kdims=['lon', 'lat']) * gf.coastline
OFKG + OF
```
